post.description: Creates a new data integration project in the specified space.

requestBody.description: The details of the project to create

get.description: Get a specific data integration project.

post.description: Exports the specified data integration project.
Imports a data integration project from a `.zip` file.

requestBody.description: The ZIP file containing the project to import

post.description: Prepares the data integration project and its tasks for execution.
Validates the data integration project and its tasks.

parameters.name: recalculate
parameters.description: Recalculate the bindings if true, otherwise saved bindings are returned.

get.description: Retrieves the export variables for a specific data integration project.

put.description: Updates the export variables for a specific data integration project.

requestBody.description: The details of the export variables to update

get.description: Lists data tasks within a given data integration project.
Get a specific data task within a project.

post.description: Prepares the specified data task for execution.
Start a data task on a data integration project.
Stop a data task on a data integration project.

get.description: Get the current runtime state of a data task

200.description: Returns all datasets for the specified data task

get.description: Returns dataset-level runtime state for a data task

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: Specifies whether to include detailed status information in the response. Set to `true` to return detailed information.

get.description: Retrieves the status of an asynchronous operation.

AsyncActionLocation.description: URL to check the status of the async action

skipped.description: Number of tasks skipped due to conflicts

space.description: The ID of the space where the project will be created

description.example: This is a new data integration project.

platformType.description: The platform type of the project. Supported values: - SNOWFLAKE: Snowflake - BIGQUERY: Google BigQuery - SYNAPSE: Azure Synapse - DATABRICKS: Databricks - REDSHIFT: Amazon Redshift - MSSQL: Microsoft SQL Server - FABRIC: Microsoft Fabric (OneLake) - QLIK_QVD: Qlik-managed QVD - QLIK_QVD_CUSTOMER_MANAGED: Customer-managed QVD

cachedChangesCount.description: Number of changes captured and cached during full load (CDC landing/replication tasks only)

failedRecordsCount.description: Number of records that failed to load (currently only for knowledge marts)

totalProcessedCount.description: Number of records (or docs in knowledge marts) were loaded.

ddlCount.description: Number of DDL statements executed during the last run

deleteCount.description: delete portion of totalProcessedCount. Only available for some task types

insertCount.description: Insert portion of totalProcessedCount. Only available for some task types

updateCount.description: update portion of totalProcessedCount. Only available for some task types

totalProcessedCount.description: Total number of changes/DMLs applied to the dataset

sourceName.description: Original name of the dataset, relevant only for data movement tasks

dataReadiness.description: Is the data ready for use?

endTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the task instance ended

gatewayId.description: For tasks that run on a gateway, this is the id of the gateway

gatewayName.description: For tasks that run on a gateway, this is the name of the gateway

datasetCount.description: Total number of datasets produced by the task, including ones in error

gatewayTaskName.description: For tasks that run on a gateway, this is the internal name of the task on the gateway

dataTaskUpdatedTo.description: The latest point in time the data reflects, based on updates from the source system.

liveViewsUpdatedTo.description: The latest point in time the live views reflect, based on updates from the source system.

datasetsInErrorCount.description: Count of datasets that encountered errors

lakehouseClusterName.description: For lakehouse storage tasks, this is the name of the cluster where the task runs

errorCount.description: Number of datasets that have failed full load in this task run

queuedCount.description: Number of datasets that are queued for full load in this task run

loadingCount.description: Number of datasets that are currently being loaded in this task run

completedCount.description: Number of datasets that have completed full load in this task run

startTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the task instance started

relatesToRecordsTo.description: This batch ends with operational source changes from this time.

relatesToRecordsFrom.description: This batch starts with operational source changes from this time.

includeBindings.description: Include bindings in the exported zip file (optional, default is false)

additionalProperties.description: The calculated ID of the variable value, when relevant.

TaskSelectionList.description: Array of tasks to prepare. Leave empty to trigger project-level orchestration using built-in logic (same as in the user interface).

region.description: The region the tenant is hosted in

tenant.description: Name of the tenant that will be called
